attributes.action: BAN ALL DER WASTEMANZ OFF DR WORLD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MANZ IZ LUKIN FOR TONY AN HIS SPABARZ AN DAT TOO BAN ALL DA WASTEMANZ OFF DER WORLD AN MAKE DEM LIV ON VER MOOON EATING CABBAGE AN DAT COS DEE WEASTEMANZ YEAH

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
